item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: rodica.andronache@vertistudio.com
item.content:encoded:
Help others by giving

Every person whose life is improved or saved, stems from an act of generosity that's purely voluntary. That's why donating is so extraordinary when you do it.

Get Involved

Our Programs

Neve Charity programs provide support in some of the poorest and most underprivileged regions, creating opportunity for those in need to learn and thrive.

About Us

For over years, Neve Charity has been working to abolish how poverty and illiteracy so that all people have access to a quality life and strive for better life conditions.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in people’s lives.

Discover all the ways
you can help give

Make a donation Start a fund Join the efforts

So far we've helped...

Countries People € 1200 Raised

Neve Charity's Stories

Life living in a poverty camp
Providing water in dry areas
You can live without money

Join our email list

Stay up to date on global charitable giving news & trends, read stories of philanthropy, and learn how the philanthropic landscape is changing.

Sign up

item.title: neve
item.dc:creator: radu

item.title: Life living in a poverty camp
item.dc:creator: radu
item.content:encoded:
Alterum atomorum nam no, duis latine necessitatibus ne per. No maiorum eligendi per. Veri iuvaret sit te, te nihil molestiae philosophia vel. At illum graeco euismod mei. Repudiandae liberavisse cum an.
Mea delenit repudiare incorrupte in, ea inimicus forensibus vel, te rebum doctus his. An mazim integre concludaturque nec, te duo illum mucius intellegebat. Fugit regione cu ius, eum ut cibo brute mandamus. Vel alienum volutpat ea, nonumy deleniti mediocritatem ut quo.

item.title: Providing water in dry areas
item.dc:creator: radu
item.content:encoded: Ex case epicuri pro, eu mel veri fastidii, audiam consectetuer an sed. Vel id soluta iuvaret deseruisse, error saepe dissentias vix ei. Virtute indoctum ei duo. Cum hinc dolores officiis cu, duo ut simul aliquando reprehendunt.

item.title: You can live without money
item.dc:creator: radu
item.content:encoded: Mea delenit repudiare incorrupte in, ea inimicus forensibus vel, te rebum doctus his. An mazim integre concludaturque nec, te duo illum mucius intellegebat. Fugit regione cu ius, eum ut cibo brute mandamus. Vel alienum volutpat ea, nonumy deleniti mediocritatem ut quo.
